description:
### New package name: **[transifex-cli](https://community.chocolatey.org/packages/transifex-cli)**

--
`transifex-client` has been deprecated as the upstream maintainer has deprecated the Python version of the Transifex client along with the API endpoints it used.
It exists only for backward compatibility to provide a transitional dummy package for existing users and scripts which may still use this package ID.
summary: The Transifex Command-line Tool enables you to manage your translations within a project without the need of an elaborate UI system.
author: The Transifex Team
